item.name: read_out_protection
item.caption: Read Out Protection
item.descript: Read protection option byte. The read protection is used to protect the software code stored in Flash memory

item.name: rdp
item.caption: RDP
item.descript: Level 0: no protection\nLevel 1: read protection of memories\nLevel 2: chip protection

item.name: nRST_STOP
item.caption: nRST_STOP
item.descript: Enable :Reset generated when entering Stop mode\nDisable:No reset generated

item.name: nRST_STDBY
item.caption: nRST_STDBY
item.descript: Enable :Reset generated when entering Standby mode\nDisable:No reset generated

item.name: VDDA_MONITOR
item.caption: VDDA_MONITOR
item.descript: Enable :VDDA power supply supervisor enabled\nDisable:VDDA power supply supervisor disabled

item.name: RAM_PARITY
item.caption: RAM_PARITY
item.descript: Enable :RAM parity check enabled\nDisable:RAM parity check disabled

item.name: nWRP0
item.caption: nWRP0
item.descript: Enable :Write protection active on this sector\nDisable:Write protection not active on this sector

item.name: nWRP1
item.caption: nWRP1
item.descript: Enable :Write protection active on this sector\nDisable:Write protection not active on this sector

item.name: nWRP2
item.caption: nWRP2
item.descript: Enable :Write protection active on this sector\nDisable:Write protection not active on this sector

item.name: nWRP3
item.caption: nWRP3
item.descript: Enable :Write protection active on this sector\nDisable:Write protection not active on this sector

item.name: nWRP4
item.caption: nWRP4
item.descript: Enable :Write protection active on this sector\nDisable:Write protection not active on this sector

item.name: nWRP5
item.caption: nWRP5
item.descript: Enable :Write protection active on this sector\nDisable:Write protection not active on this sector

item.name: nWRP6
item.caption: nWRP6
item.descript: Enable :Write protection active on this sector\nDisable:Write protection not active on this sector

item.name: nWRP7
item.caption: nWRP7
item.descript: Enable :Write protection active on this sector\nDisable:Write protection not active on this sector
